msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso of col. 104 is blank

supportDesc.support: 1 papyrus ; col. 104: 19.5 x 36 cm; total size: ***

condition.ab: Col. 104: complete (papyrus cut off left of col. 104 when housed in glass); cols. 105-120 were cut off and are missing

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Petheus son of Didymos and Tauris grandson of Maron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 201)
Ptolemaios son of Sambas and Aphrodous grandson of Sabinus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Ptolema daughter of Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Tanouris daughter of Isidoros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 234)
Thaisas daughter of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 174)
Naaraus son of Nasses (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Sisois son of Onnophris and Tapetheus grandson of Akousilaos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Zenas son of Phaesis and Tapasion grandson of Zenas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 165)
Charis daughter of Chairemon (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Pakysis son of Onnophris and Soeris grandson of Satabous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: (Col.) [[103]] 104;;(Pauni 5, entry of Harpochration, son of Posis, continued from col. 103:);for Psenarpsenesis, similarly, for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 2 obols; for supplements, 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total 2 1/2 obols.;Petheus, son of Didymos and Tauris, grandson of Maron, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 80;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas and Aphrodous, grandson of Sabinus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 95;Ptolema, daughter of Hera, with the (dues) on the account of Tanouris, daughter of Isidoros - (through) Pudens -, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 7 drachmai 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 4 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 5 obols; for eparourion, 8 drachmai 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 obols. Total: 20 drachmai. (In left margin: 20 drachmai 4 obols.);Thaisas, daughter of Onnophris - (through) Naaraus, son of Nasses - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 5 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 3 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 3 drachmai 2 obols; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 11 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: 12 drachmai.);Gemella Anthestia - (through) the daughter of Pammyrikos - (that is) the wife of Sarap(--), son of Theagenes - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 7 drachmai 3 obols; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 1/2 obol; for naubion, 4 1/2 obols; for supplements, 2 drachmai; for eparourion, 7 drachmai 3 obols; for supplements, 4 obols; for kollybos, 2 obols. Total: 19 drachmai 5 obols;;for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 1 drachme 2 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: 20 drachmai 17 obols.);Sisois, son of Onnophris and Tapetheus, grandson of Akousilaos, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 101;Zenas, son of Phaesis and Tapasion, grandson of Zenas: 4 drachmai; and for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 103;Charis, daughter of Chairemon - (through) Heron the Arab archer - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 3 drachmai 4 1/2 obols; for olive (transportation), 3 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for eparourion, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for supplements, 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1 obol. Total: 8 drachmai 3 obols;;for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 2 obols; for supplements, 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 2 1/2 obols. (In left margin: 8 drachmai 13 obols.);Pakysis, son of Onnophris and Soeris, grandson of Satabous: 8 drachmai; column 97;Total for the day: 108 drachmai 22 obols.
